alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 10:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL DELAWARE AND NORTHWESTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1023 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Johnstown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Utica, Hartford and US Route 62 at State Route 661. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
